00016 TriangleShape::TriangleShape(const string& name)
00017 {
00018     triangle = static_cast<TriangleRenderable*>(SceneManager::get()->createComponent("TriangleRenderable", name));
00019     node = SceneManager::get()->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode(name);
00020     node->setPosition(hgeVector(0, 0));
00021     node->attachComponent(triangle);
00022 }
00023 
00024 TriangleShape::~TriangleShape()
00025 {
00026     string name = node->getName();
00027     SceneManager::get()->destroySceneNode(node);
00028     SceneManager::get()->destroyComponent(name, true);
00029 }
00030 
00031 const string TriangleShape::getSummary()
00032 {
00033     string summary = "Triangle vertices: ";
00034 
00035     vector<Triangle*> triangles = triangle->getTriangles();
00036 
00037     for (int i = 0; i < triangles.size(); ++i)
00038         summary += Utils::get()->formatString("%i=[%.1f %.1f] [%.1f %.1f] [%.1f %.1f] ", i, triangles[i]->vert1.x, triangles[i]->vert1.y,
00039                                                                                             triangles[i]->vert2.x, triangles[i]->vert2.y,
00040                                                                                             triangles[i]->vert3.x, triangles[i]->vert3.y);
00041 
00042     return summary;
00043 }
00044 
00045 void TriangleShape::addTriangle(const hgeVector& v1, const hgeVector& v2, const hgeVector& v3)
00046 {
00047     Utils* utils = Utils::get();
00048     double rand = utils->getRandomDouble(0.5, .9);
00049 
00050     hgeColor color = hgeColor(utils->getRandomDouble(0.3, 1.0), utils->getRandomDouble(0.3, 1.0), utils->getRandomDouble(0.3, 1.0), rand);
00051     triangle->addTriangle(v1, v2, v3, hgeVector(0, 0), hgeVector(0, 0), hgeVector(0, 0), color, color, color);
00052 }
00053 
00054 void TriangleShape::hide()
00055 {
00056     node->setVisible(false);
00057 }
00058 
00059 void TriangleShape::show()
00060 {
00061     node->setVisible(true);
00062 }

00064 void TriangleShape::clearTriangles()
00065 {
00066     triangle->clearTriangles();
00067 }
